import { StyledForm } from "./Form.js" import { Formik, Form as FormikForm, Field, ErrorMessage } from "formik" import * as Yup from "yup" const validationSchema = Yup.object({ name: Yup.string().required("Name is required").min(2, "Name is too short"), email: Yup.string().required("Email is required").email("Email is invalid"), phone: Yup.string() .required("Phone is required") .matches(/^\d+$/, "Invalid value") .min(12, "Phone number must be at least 12 digits") .max(12, "Phone number must be at most 12 digits"), }) export default function Form() { return ( { console.log(values) resetForm() }} validationSchema={validationSchema} > {({ errors, touched }) => (
)} ) }
